sentences.en: “That was my epiphany, ” he said of the sweetness he was trying to recapture.
sentences.cn: “这是我的顿悟，”他说到他正在设法再次体验的甜蜜。

sentences.en: A good sharp dressing counterpointed the sweetness of the dried fruit.
sentences.cn: 味道浓烈的上好调味品和香甜的干果形成有趣的对比。

sentences.en: By her sweetness Ivy managed to survive the drawn - out brutality.
sentences.cn: 艾薇靠着自己随和的性情,总算在持续很久的残忍中生存了下来.

sentences.en: Florida oranges have a natural sweetness.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达柑橘带有一种天然的甘甜。

sentences.en: He had the most entrancing generosity and sweetness.
sentences.cn: 他具有最迷人的慷慨和温柔气质。

sentences.en: I used to be all sweetness and light on the outside, but inside I would be boiling with rage.
sentences.cn: 我过去常常是外表看上去轻松愉快，而内心却怒火中烧。

sentences.en: If you have tasted the bitterness of gall , you know better the sweetness of honey.
sentences.cn: 吃过黄连苦, 更知蜜糖甜.

sentences.en: It has not all been sweetness and light between him and the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 他和首相的关系并不总是那么愉快融洽。

sentences.en: Khrushchev's next visit to the West was one of sweetness and light.
sentences.cn: 赫鲁晓夫接下来对西方的那一次访问是政治上和谐的访问。

sentences.en: Royalty had lost its grace and sweetness; its pomps became a reproach.
sentences.cn: 国王身份已经失去了光彩,失去了甜蜜的滋味; 那些威风凛凛的排场已经成了一种羞辱.
她的笑里只有虚情假意的甜蜜.

sentences.en: She's all sweetness and light provided you're doing what she wants.
sentences.cn: 只要顺着她,她是又和蔼又讲理.

sentences.en: The saltiness of the cheese is balanced by the sweetness of the red peppers.
sentences.cn: 红辣椒的甜味调和了奶酪的咸味。

sentences.en: The sunburnt grass breathed a harvest breath of dry sweetness and content.
sentences.cn: 草给阳光晒枯了,发出一阵叫人意满心欢的收获期的芳香气息.

sentences.en: the sweetness of the wild rose
This is a full - bodied wine with just a hint of sweetness.
sentences.cn: 这是一种味道醇厚的葡萄酒,只有一丝甜味.

sentences.en: What he said dripped with false sweetness.
sentences.cn: 他的话中充满了虚情假意.

words.tran_cn: 甜的；悦耳的；芳香的；亲切的；n. 糖果；乐趣；芳香；宝贝；（俚）酷毙了
有点甜的；过甜的；有点可爱的
甜美地；温柔地；惬意地；讨人喜欢地

trans.tran_en: how sweet something tastes or smells
